<p>原文：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fmp.weixin.qq.com%2Fs%2FycxN1x77RVSxMNH0edkB4g" target="_blank" title="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/ycxN1x77RVSxMNH0edkB4g" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">mp.weixin.qq.com/s/ycxN1x77R…</a></p>
<p>在前端动效开发领域，那些老生常谈的动画库，像&nbsp;<code>animate.js</code>、<code>animate.css</code>&nbsp;动画等，只能实现一些常规的动画效果，想做出那种惊艳全场的动画真是难如登天。</p>
<p>不过别担心，今天就给大家带来&nbsp;<strong>Vue3</strong>&nbsp;生态中最强大的&nbsp;<strong>10</strong>&nbsp;个动效组件库，让你轻松实现炫酷动画，为项目增色不少。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-0">1. GSAP</h2>
<p><strong>GSAP</strong>（<code>GreenSock Animation Platform</code>）可是动画领域的 “老大哥”，功能超级强大。</p>
<p>它能给任何&nbsp;<strong>HTML</strong>&nbsp;元素甚至&nbsp;<strong>JavaScript</strong>&nbsp;对象添加动画效果，而且性能超棒，在各个浏览器上都能稳定运行。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/b7c9462dcba940e985e047e5eda37541~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg54us56uL5byA6ZiA6ICFX0Z3dENvZGVy:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753246054&amp;x-signature=ar%2BRH8ODlhcGXpqkCpC2p7OrgYw%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>用它做出那些复杂的、天马行空的动画效果，那简直就跟玩儿一样。</p>
<p>无论是<code>抛物线运动</code>、<code>弧形运动</code>，还是<code>缓动</code>、<code>弹性</code>等复杂动画，它都能轻松搞定，堪称动画界的 “瑞士军刀”。</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>官网</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgsap.com%2F" target="_blank" title="https://gsap.com/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">gsap.com/</a></li>
<li><strong>GitHub</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fgreensock%2FGSAP" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/greensock/GSAP" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/greensock/G…</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">2. Anime.js</h2>
<p><strong>Anime.js</strong>&nbsp;是一款轻量级又极易上手的动画库。</p>
<p>它专注于动画的 “本职工作”，能把&nbsp;<code>CSS</code>&nbsp;动画和&nbsp;<code>JavaScript</code>&nbsp;动画完美融合。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/cf6f2656cf5e44069ba06fc24a425038~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg54us56uL5byA6ZiA6ICFX0Z3dENvZGVy:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753246054&amp;x-signature=Mr1qjnUfekUWlhcs4GVs%2FAOdSow%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>无论是简单的元素运动，还是复杂的多元素协同动画，<strong>Anime.js</strong>&nbsp;都能轻松拿捏，而且代码写起来简洁明了。</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>官网</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fanimejs.com%2F" target="_blank" title="https://animejs.com/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">animejs.com/</a></li>
<li><strong>GitHub</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fjuliangarnier%2Fanime" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/juliangarnier/anime" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/juliangarni…</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">3. Inspira UI</h2>
<p>这是一款专门为&nbsp;<strong>Vue3</strong>&nbsp;设计的动效组件库，官方示例有&nbsp;<strong>100 +</strong> &nbsp;个。</p>
<p>它自带超多惊艳的动画效果，像<code>炫酷背景</code>、<code>粒子特效</code>、<code>按钮交互</code>等，无需额外引入其他库就能做出流畅的过渡效果。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/5d73fbff0566477992b8d52f5ce26b73~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg54us56uL5byA6ZiA6ICFX0Z3dENvZGVy:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753246054&amp;x-signature=%2FeyEwx8SRy11XfnaBYKDwoLkElM%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>而且每个组件都高度可自定义，能完美兼容&nbsp;<strong>Vue3</strong>&nbsp;和&nbsp;<strong>Nuxt.js</strong>，加载速度快，性能也很出色。</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>官网</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Finspira-ui.com%2F" target="_blank" title="https://inspira-ui.com/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">inspira-ui.com/</a></li>
<li><strong>GitHub</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Funovue%2Finspira-ui" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/unovue/inspira-ui" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/unovue/insp…</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">4. Uiverse.io</h2>
<p><strong>Uiverse.io</strong>&nbsp;是一个超厉害的协作设计工具，它聚焦于 UI 组件和动画。</p>
<p>它就好比是一个动画的 “梦工厂”，能让你轻松设计、原型制作和分享各种&nbsp;<strong>UI 组件</strong>和<strong>动画</strong>。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/e1aca469bd604b1ea5047adf1d381bbf~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg54us56uL5byA6ZiA6ICFX0Z3dENvZGVy:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753246054&amp;x-signature=uUrkLvB9wbmCZfNshR9J1DLAEsA%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>里面有着超多的<code>组件</code>和<code>模板</code>，动画编辑功能也是强大到不行，你可以把不同的组件拼凑在一起，加上各种动画效果，就像搭积木一样，轻松打造出复杂又惊艳的动画场景。</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>官网</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fuiverse.io%2F" target="_blank" title="https://uiverse.io/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">uiverse.io/</a></li>
<li><strong>GitHub</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fuiverse-io" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/uiverse-io" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/uiverse-io</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">5. NavNav+</h2>
<p><strong>NavNav+</strong> &nbsp;是一个集合了超过&nbsp;<strong>1000</strong>&nbsp;种&nbsp;<strong>UI</strong>&nbsp;组件模板的在线平台，它不仅提供了丰富的设计资源，还允许用户查看每个案例的源码和实时效果。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/8bd42838d1704a29a2b7ff4214672986~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg54us56uL5byA6ZiA6ICFX0Z3dENvZGVy:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753246054&amp;x-signature=LWs%2B%2FWODNOw81%2BSL0VC7de8QHp8%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>NavNav+</strong> &nbsp;提供了从<code>动效按钮</code>、<code>登录界面</code>、<code>表格</code>、<code>下拉框</code>到<code>加载动效</code>、<code>网页导航</code>等几乎所有你需要的组件。每个组件都经过精心设计，确保了美观性和功能性。</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>官网</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fthuvien.org%2Fnavnav%2F" target="_blank" title="https://thuvien.org/navnav/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">thuvien.org/navnav/</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-5">6. Galacean Engine</h2>
<p><strong>Galacean Engine</strong>&nbsp;是蚂蚁重磅开源&nbsp;<strong>Web 3D</strong>&nbsp;动效引擎，是一个专注于&nbsp;<strong>3D</strong>&nbsp;场景实时渲染的引擎，它在动画方面也有着出色的表现。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/b3d63c744ad042f6a752bcc7f47a035e~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg54us56uL5byA6ZiA6ICFX0Z3dENvZGVy:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753246054&amp;x-signature=k%2FUT4ikg8BPZBav5V5Bm3uXHAhY%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>它能实现&nbsp;<code>3D 模型</code>、<code>相机</code>、<code>灯光</code>等元素的动画效果，还支持<code>关键帧动画</code>、<code>程序化动画</code>和<code>动画混合</code>，能做出逼真的&nbsp;<strong>3D</strong>&nbsp;动画场景，让你的项目瞬间高端大气上档次。</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>官网</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgalacean.antgroup.com%2Fengine%2F" target="_blank" title="https://galacean.antgroup.com/engine/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">galacean.antgroup.com/engine/</a></li>
<li><strong>GitHub</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fgalacean%2Fengine" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/galacean/engine" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/galacean/en…</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-6">7. Color4BG</h2>
<p><strong>Color4BG</strong>&nbsp;顾名思义，就是在颜色动画方面特别厉害。</p>
<p>它能实现&nbsp;<code>RGB</code>、<code>HSL</code>、<code>HEX</code>&nbsp;等格式颜色之间的平滑过渡和渐变动画效果，把页面的颜色变化玩出花来，为整个页面增添不少灵动的气息。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/a0d300863ee2453483877e04f27ec2b8~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg54us56uL5byA6ZiA6ICFX0Z3dENvZGVy:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753246054&amp;x-signature=B%2BYKmNWyL2NDcTLhzCEzpyVvq8s%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li><strong>官网</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fcolor4bg.com" target="_blank" title="https://color4bg.com" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">color4bg.com</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-7">8. Tween.js</h2>
<p><strong>Tween.js</strong>&nbsp;是一个专注于渐变动画的轻量级 JavaScript 动画库。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/8c945dda82d344eeb432ad7ff49098b8~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg54us56uL5byA6ZiA6ICFX0Z3dENvZGVy:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753246054&amp;x-signature=ffznoPOmgGiKVV13kTl1pqkUsO0%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>它能把对象的属性从一个状态平滑地过渡到另一个状态，简单易用，很适合用来实现一些基本的动画效果，像是元素的<code>位置</code>、<code>大小</code>、<code>透明度</code>等属性的变化。</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>官网</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Ftweenjs.github.io%2Ftween.js%2Fdocs%2Fuser_guide.html" target="_blank" title="https://tweenjs.github.io/tween.js/docs/user_guide.html" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">tweenjs.github.io/tween.js/do…</a></li>
<li><strong>GitHub</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Ftweenjs%2Ftween.js" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/tweenjs/tween.js" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/tweenjs/twe…</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-8">9. Motion Vue</h2>
<p><strong>Motion Vue</strong>&nbsp;是基于&nbsp;<strong>Framer Motion</strong>&nbsp;为&nbsp;<strong>Vue3</strong>打造的动画库。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/67d16fdb83754821ac5a3eb44d9322a7~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg54us56uL5byA6ZiA6ICFX0Z3dENvZGVy:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753246054&amp;x-signature=YsCVo3RpVHo2lE2CpFZSae6yaLE%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>Framer Motion 本身在 React 世界里就很厉害，而 Motion Vue 把这些优秀的动画能力带到了&nbsp;<strong>Vue3</strong>&nbsp;生态中，能让开发者轻松实现各种复杂的动画效果，打造出极具视觉冲击力的界面。</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>官网</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fmotion.unovue.com%2F" target="_blank" title="https://motion.unovue.com/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">motion.unovue.com/</a></li>
<li><strong>GitHub</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fmotiondivision%2Fmotion-vue" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/motiondivision/motion-vue" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/motiondivis…</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-9">10. TresJS</h2>
<p><strong>TresJS</strong>&nbsp;是一个&nbsp;<strong>three.js</strong>&nbsp;扩展库，它让在&nbsp;<strong>Vue3</strong>&nbsp;中创建 3D 动画变得简单高效。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/a2406340440745b3b1f441d342b4d348~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg54us56uL5byA6ZiA6ICFX0Z3dENvZGVy:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753246054&amp;x-signature=R%2FunP6A2nloFc4YyB5YK2VuSdAU%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>借助&nbsp;<strong>three.js</strong>&nbsp;的强大渲染能力，TresJS 能帮助开发者轻松做出炫酷的&nbsp;<strong>3D 动画效果</strong>，无论是 3D 模型的动画、相机的动画还是灯光的动画都不在话下。</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>官网</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.tresjs.org" target="_blank" title="https://docs.tresjs.org" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">docs.tresjs.org</a></li>
<li><strong>GitHub</strong>&nbsp;：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Ftresjs%2Ftres" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/tresjs/tres" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/tresjs/tres</a></li>
</ul></div></div>
